name: DreamShooter
description:
【Overview】
The number of stages is all 64 stages of the large volume.
Barrage As we advance in the second half will become violently.
While bypass your beautiful barrage, you can experience the exhilaration to defeat the formidable enemy.

【Story】
This dream world.
Hero who had wandered to the amusement park of the nightmare.
Tilt the various nightmare who come attacked, and trying to escape from the dream world!

【How to Play】
All you have to do is.
Just Slide the screen to move the ship!
Shot will be fired automatically.

【Corresponding Terminal】
iOS6 or later is supported.
iPhone5 and later models is recommended.

【Reference】
BGM reference:Music Sozai-ya purgatory garden-like
Barrage image reference:Secret base like MEISU

【Note】
This app images and sound effects (some exceptions) is we have been using the free material.
